website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty shade sail comes in a range of colors and sizes to choose from.
pros: Provides 80 to 85% shade and blocks out up to 98% of harmful UV rays
Made from durable 185 GSM UV protected HDPE that's also breathable to allow a breeze to pass through
cons: Some buyers don't like the look of the seam across the center

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy install with planning
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. It is lightweight and provides shade, but not protection from rain (as described). I spent another $120 on materials and hardware to install it because my deck extends away from the west side of my house. To get max shade required installing two 8-foot posts at the far corners of the deck and anchoring the third point to the house. If you plan to keep this up for long periods, invest in quality metal turnbuckles and hardware that will stand up to intense sun, wind, or rain.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this shade sail. It works perfect for our backyard patio. It’s a lot better quality then some with a great price. You do need to buy the extra turn buckles and tie straps.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to block partial sun . Just make sure you measure where you want to put it . I ordered one too small and ordered a bigger one for more covered area. It also helps keep debris out of the pool!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Recommend purchasing. A good value.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive product. I used a clear coated cable for supports. Recommend that you use rope (clothes line) first to see how the sails end up situated prior to installing the cable. If I hadn't done so, I would have wasted some expensive cable. Note that the sails do not entirely block out the sun, but do provide relief from direct rays.
customer_reviews.author: Renee E Kapron

customer_reviews.title: Nice shade!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, my patio doesn't get shade from the slow growing tree until 3 pm... I've been living this way for 20 years. I wish I had been aware of these long ago. Great construction. I mounted mine with a hardware kit, and 45' of vinyl coated clothes line wire. Tension on wire is not extreme, but it takes some work to properly hang these. I wouldn't leave it in place during a Midwest thunderstorm if you want it to last and not to have the anchors ripped from you home. I have 16' triangle .
customer_reviews.author: VPW

customer_reviews.title: It didn't come with the home!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a home and they had a couple of these over the back patio. While the sellers were nice enough to leave the mounting hardware up, they didn't leave the sails. We found them in a store for a lot more money and were happy to find them online. They arrived and up they went the next weekend. We have high winds in Michigan, rain, high winds and rain, then lots of rain, then a little sun before it rains in the spring/summer. These are holding up beautifully. I can see these lasting several years.
customer_reviews.author: TK Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality shade sail
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this sail along with a few other sizes to see what would work best in our setup. We ended up with a 16' triangle and a 12x16' rectangle in combination to provide exceptional shade to our new deck. Never mess around with an umbrella again! The shade is not 100%, but the difference in temp is noticeable, and in direct sunlight, it provides excellent relief from the heat. Setup was easy once we got the correct hardware and installed the eyehooks in the right places. It will take some trial and error, so be prepared to use some rope to rough out the design. We were very happy with the end result!
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Did the job but seams were a little stretched out and material could have been nicer quality. Decided to keep it as we needed it that day since it was 95 degrees on our deck for a party.
customer_reviews.author: champt02

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was expecting at a cost less than what I was expecting. They have only been up for a few weeks so I cannot speak to their durability. I live in the Arizona desert so nothing lasts too long with the amount of sunshine we get throughout the year. I would expect them to last 1-2 years tops. I used steel cables and turnbuckles instead of vinyl rope which I strongly recommend as they do seem to expand and contract slightly with the heat. The turnbuckles allow me to keep them tight. The material is thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: GET TWO :)
customer_reviews.text: We just hung these over our patio area and love them ... not only for the shade they provide but for the pizzazz they have added to our yard. We are waiting for a 25' string of light to complete the look. FYI we ordered Amazon's Extreme Max 3008.0349 Red 3/8" x 50' 16-Strand Diamond Braid Utility Rope with which to hang them.
customer_reviews.author: copperandgold

customer_reviews.title: I'm Throwin Tons of Shade!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pool is awesome when it gets into the 100's of degrees here in Fresno, CA. Without shade though we had to keep getting out to reapply sunscreen and it just kind of ruined the whole cooling off thing. We decided to grab a 20x20x20 triangle and holy cow does it do a number on the backyard! Not only does it keep my pool better shaded, but it also keeps the sun off of my back patio during the hottest part of the day. Had I known this thing would be so great I'd have bought one years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Tiki Lab

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It works great for what it is. It looks nice. It shades my inflatable hot tub that would get damaged if it were in constant sun every day. Some sunlight still gets thru, but it is greatly reduced. The surface temp of the hot tub is only slightly warmer than the 100% house-shaded parts. Before the sun shade the surface would get extremely hot to the touch when in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Don M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Universal use
customer_reviews.text: I got the 16 x16x16 triangle shade and I’m glad I did. The price is really good compared to buying them at the big box stores. We got this one to replace a big box store one. The quality is really good and they are durable. The grommets on them are steady and well sowed in. The size is a a good six and allows you to install it in different locations. We end up ordering 4 more of these to use throughout the garden area and back yard.
customer_reviews.author: MicaelaM.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made except not cut properly...couldn't tell until installed; not taking it down now.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought 12' x 12' x 17'.....knew that the edge is curved, not straight.....however, the two short sides were scalloped inward and the long side was curved outward????.....must be a mistake since no photos or diagrams indicated such.....consequently the the long side sorta hangs a little loose in the middle....well made except not cut properly...couldn't tell until installed and I'm not taking it down now.....I used zinc turnbuckles & screw eyes, ss hammock springs and vinyl coated clothesline to install.....the three 5' plastic ropes that came with it are a joke....
customer_reviews.author: panotx

customer_reviews.title: This is made of some type of plastic rather than burlap like I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely NOT easy to install. It took a lot of back and forth to get it perfectly tight and straight. We tried to make straight lines to the ends to make it hang correctly. We decided to use chain instead of rope because I want to unhook it in the winter and put back in the spring. I love the aesthetic of it and it really does put a barrier to things falling from the tree and the sun. One unexpected issue, my dog is terrified of it. I think it is because it moves gently with wind flow and she sees it out of the corner of her eye as if it will fall on her.
customer_reviews.author: pdx girl

customer_reviews.title: 2 seasons in and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: We are on our 2nd season of use and this is still great. We have 3 total from this company to provide some shade and block direct sunlight so my fair skin wife can use the pool with me and my son before 4pm in the afternoon. This lets her start using the pool as soon at 10am. We took them down and stored for winter, they unfolded fine and went back up on the hooks with no problem. They dont block rain, but they help keep the pool cleaner for longer from rain dirt. Very happy with the purchase. The product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Klaren Family

customer_reviews.title: Only time will tell; but for now, it’s totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for sunshade (instead of umbrella) because I didn’t want to spend too much money right away. Umbrellas can get costly with base and umbrella itself so I opt in for this and I cannot complain. Although it was little hard to put in alone( this being super huge), I managed to tie it up to tension rods and boom, I have a completely different patio now! I loved how it had double stitching around corners, making it much stronger. It it not absolutely water resistant but I didn’t buy this for that reason. Overall, a 5-star for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad, not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the random cross stitching on the side: on one of the corners, it looks like they had to add a more fabric to make a corner by stitching it on. The fabric seems like a sturdy breathable tarp. The overall product is decently made. It was a pain to put up. Tension has to be tight for the edges not to roll. I purchased the 16x16x16 and after measuring, the sides are not equal. It’s more of an isosceles triangle instead of an equilateral triangle. Other than that, product works well.
customer_reviews.author: WheelerFam

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunshade for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had outdoor furniture that I could barely use by the pool. We tried several expensive and not so good looking umbrellas. Problem is umbrellas are gangly and get in the way of everything. I really adore this shade. It was really easy to install. I was a bit suspicious that it was so cheap. I would not even care if I needed to replace it yearly. It's 1/20th the price of a decent cantilever umbrella. We also get high winds so this is far safer than an umbrella that could blow over. The color is neutral and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: The 'Hem' on one side was too loose.
customer_reviews.text: It was just as expected, however when we hung it, the one side could not be made taught. It was as if the material had been stretched and left too long making it droop. I would have returned it but an inebriated friend burnt two holes it with her cigarette ashes!! We will use it for big parties should we need extra coverage. The color was just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Bit disappointed with the fabric, very light, very porous and doesn’t even pretend to keep any water out; it pours through the fabric in even the lightest rain-shower. It does provide a modicum of shade, but even so, lets quite a lot of light through especially on bright sunny days. Worst part though is the seams ate not machined straight so the edges curl over even if tensioned very tightly. 3 stars I am afraid, but this might be one star too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blocks sunlight, but quickly stretches out
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a week, then I had to readjust the mounting brackets, because the shade had stretched and sagged. Some drooping is expected, I get that, but it was chest level. Cool. So a few more holes in the house trim, remount the brackets, and it was looking good again...for a couple of weeks. Now it's sagging again, and I've about had it. I would've taken it down already, but it's the only thing protecting my porch from the triple digit Texas heat. I have a feeling it's going to start shedding plastic fibers soon. Pretty disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 16x16x16 in green. Similar (but not identical) material as those green plastic tarps you buy. Stretchy, but not enough that I can get the sag out of one side. Looks cheap. Meh. At least it was inexpensive. Edit: My wife likes it so there’s that. She says what do you expect for what you paid? I’ve torqued up the tightness and that helps, but it could be better, but probably not at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Rogman

customer_reviews.title: Life changing, seriously.
customer_reviews.text: Life changing. Cut down shade trees and inground pool became too hot to be relaxing for about 5 weeks in the summer. Lived with an expensive (chemicals), useless pool on the hottest days for the last couple years. Bought a second, bigger tarp the day we installed the first. Immediate lowering of pool temp, back to using the pool on the hottest days AND no one had sunburn this entire summer. Recommended to a friend who enjoyed the same experience with his above ground pool. 2 tarps and all the gear to install for less than $100. Parties are back on folks!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy D.

customer_reviews.title: Blowing in the Wind
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described, make sure it's fastened securely. Purchased the 13 by 13 by 13, using in landscape installations. Will likely purchase the next larger size for the next larger size landscape installation.
customer_reviews.author: lino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade is perfect for our yard! We were looking for something to help with partial shade on our backyard pool since we have no trees. We purchased 3 10ft posts and used the sunshade to make a canopy. It seems to be very well constructed. It was fairly easy to install. We used climbing hooks in the eyelets to attach to eye bolt screws in the posts for easy removal during storms. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you can find someone to help you install this, I'd highly recommend not trying to do it yourself. Which is obviously what I did. It was a bit difficult, but once I figure out how I was going to lay it out, and rigged other corners up as if I had extra hands, it all came together pretty easily. Great quality product, very durable and looks great in our backyard. Before we couldn't play darts in the afternoon without being blinded by the sun. Now we have plenty of shade and a space we love to be in.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great shade
customer_reviews.text: High quality and easy to put up. We bought this to put above our firepit and wanted a mid grade sail, just in case the heat would be too much. Thankfully at ~9ft above the flames it is perfectly fine. Provides great shade coverage and on the misty nights helps keep us a bit drier. Glad we went this less expensive route instead of a pergola.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks alright but we haven't yet installed it as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks alright but we haven't yet installed it as it doesn't come with any way to attach it to upright poles! There should be some sort of strap and clip included, so I am waiting for an order from Lowe's and hope the things I chose will work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Lowered our AC bill
customer_reviews.text: They shrink in heat/sun so make sure to install them while somewhat cooler in the morning. Other than that no complaints. They do not block all of the sunshine which was our objective so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material full of small holes so has a very low shade rate.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material full of small holes so has a very low shade rate. See pics including comparison to another brand (much darker). Sides baconed - looks like not cut to right curve. Pretty much useless
customer_reviews.author: Janie Yu

customer_reviews.title: 2 Weeks & Seam Undone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this up for 2 weeks. Not even any crazy weather in that time. Today we noticed a seam completely undone. Defective. Horrible durability!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Tore/ripped after install at corner
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement sail shade, we hung it on the existing frame and the next day the corner was torn. The second one tore a few weeks after being hung. We had the previous sail shades up for 5 years before replacing, and only because they were dirty, no problems with durability. We're very disappointed these tore, the sail material and stitching is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lav

customer_reviews.title: I love shade
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shade producer. Be aware that the geometry is such that you have to have open space and attach points in just the right places (or the ability to make them in just the right places). Buy some parachute cord, or wire rope and turnbuckles for a truly great installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 16' x 16' x 16' sail shade to protect our car wash auto cashier from direct sunlight (it's hard for customers to read the screen in direct sunlight). It is perfect for the application and appears that it will give me years of use. Thanks for the great product! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JJONES

customer_reviews.title: strong fabric, nice color
customer_reviews.text: Really strong material - could tell it was good quality as soon as I opened it. Love this color - the sand is perfect, doesn’t get too dirty and also keeps things bright! Really excited to use this! The only bummer is that it Doesn’t comes with sniffing to set it up and outs actually kind of expensive to buy
customer_reviews.author: MelWend

customer_reviews.title: So thankful we chose this option!
customer_reviews.text: We installed 3 shades after trying to find a more secure way to shade our deck. We had a canopy for several years, and looked into pergolas and other options when it cane time to replace. The sails were the most cost-efficient, plus gave us the flexibility to set it up in the most beneficial way to us. The only reason I didn't give more stars is because I can't fairly judge the durability and such when we haven't had the sail up for long. The material feels strong and looks great. It provides the most beautiful shade for our backyard area.
customer_reviews.author: fousters

customer_reviews.title: Great for price but skills be professionally set up with better hardware
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but you will need to have something sturdy to post them to. We hired a company to do it professionally and they recommended better hardware and a strong post. I’m not sure the material will last four note thank a couple summers. We plan to take them down when it snows and repost in summer months.
customer_reviews.author: shelley mutrie

customer_reviews.title: Good but made with a mistake.
customer_reviews.text: So I get that there may be seams on a product like this. However the triangle shaped one I purchased had a seam at a narrow part of one of the vertices. So take a guess how long the seam lasted. About a week before it began to unravel. So I will have to send this one back. Hopefully the next one doesn’t have a seam in a highly stressed portion of the sail.
customer_reviews.author: seh

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable construction!
customer_reviews.text: The construction of these sails is incredible. I had a 4x6 post installed as a contact point and during a severe wind storm the sail was able to lift this post (with 3 ft of concrete ball attached) out of the ground without a single rip in the stitching. Despite the back breaking work ahead of me, I’m seriously impressed by this product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Gave my plants some protection from sun!
customer_reviews.text: SoCal has been/is/will be in the triple digits these days. I am thankful for these shade sails that have given ample protection for my plants. Otherwise, my plant babies will have been fried! I have multiple shade sails from this company now and have been happy woth their product. I will be saving up for a 50"x16"!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne F

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: excellent said. Grommets are strong and tight, heavy fabric breaths and it repels light rain. Water resistant fabric, some sort of plastic material not cotton. Nice color. Lets light through but not harsh sun. Easy to use, I attached it to pulley so I can take it down easily.
customer_reviews.author: nick d

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable for sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: We can't wait to put it up after received it last weekend for sun protection. We love this shade sail, bring just enough shade to the areas needed. Since the kids can only goes to the backyard for some outdoor fun; this is great for sun protection. We're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Uni

customer_reviews.title: Important asset
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I order a shade sail and I can say I am really about the results.I was advised by a friend because I use to complain about the sun that easily heats on my backyard.I really like reading out of home as I am not working anymore and my umbrella wasn't helping a lot.I decided to order this shade sail recommended by a friend and I can thank my friend who recommended this seller.They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Abra

customer_reviews.title: Does it works
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material and heavy metal fro the anchoring, easy to install. The best is the cooling of the area it covers, and how easy it is to put and take off. Use it on top of our jacuzzi area and it allows light and breeze but cover from excess sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kya Sang

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as advertised: it’s very strong, well constructed, high quality materials and it reduces sunlight not block it, that’s actually way what I like very much. It’s easy to install and still keep very good condition after this rain season. I think I need to buy other bigger size to cover more backyard area. Can’t wait for sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: LING

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's perfect for camping! It's small enough where it takes up minimal space but large enough to cook under without the hot sun beating down. Totally thrilled and most people don't use this for camping but, I do and like the idea :-) light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina V.

customer_reviews.title: for this price - best shade solution
customer_reviews.text: i live in miami and i have outdoor car wash and detailing we used this shade like additional shade to our existing structure, worked fine for us 6 month in `Fl wind, sun and rain
customer_reviews.author: Lev Tretyakov

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I (for moral support) put it up. It didn't take long since I bought a package with the necessary items (carabiners, screws, rope, etc) to install. All you need is a tall ladder and a patient installer. It looks great installed and does provides shade.
customer_reviews.author: CodyGirltoo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but size up!
customer_reviews.text: I measured and remeasured but ended up needing more shade so returned it and I sized up. The quality is great. I would just suggest getting the largest one possible if you want to cover a car. (return was processed easily)
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! May buy another one
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed to give some shade for over our pool! Easy to install. We bought the mounting pieces at local home depot after reading reviews about kits. Have had it up for a month and so far it's held up well in Texas heat and crazy thunderstorms with very strong winds and hail! Now I'm considering buying another one for shade over swingset!
customer_reviews.author: AMOR6

customer_reviews.title: As expected. Great price for a sturdy sail.
customer_reviews.text: Material is more plastic feeling than expected. But it looks good up and provides the diffused protections we wanted. Color is true to the picture. Very easy to install. Don’t forget to buy the hanging hardware if you want tension connectors. It can be assembled with just the rope that it comes with. There are grommets on each corner.
customer_reviews.author: Jiffy Iuen

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have had these on my house for the last 3 years without issue. I have two polls mounted to my deck and then 4 anchor points on my home. I leave them up from April until October even during storms (im on the water so we get high winds often) and never had issues. The best way to install them is to not use a turnbuckle but instead use a SS clip this way it cant come undone. I have 3 of them and there is slight tearing after all this time on one from where it has been rubbing a cable from the other one next to it (not the shades fault). Would defiantly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle O.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These have held up for me during medium thunder storms for the past 5 months. No issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is cool (literally & figuratively)
customer_reviews.text: Some challenges to setup trying balance it out a little bit. One of my attach points was about 12 inches to close, that is ok, still managed to make it work and now my sensitive plants can have SPF 140. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Hans-Jurgen Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Great shade! Don’t forget the hardware...
customer_reviews.text: This provides great shade and was fairly easy to install. Took a bit of math due to the location we wanted it, but it looks great. You will need to purchase the hardware that goes with sail shades to install it correctly and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric and has held up well for a full season
customer_reviews.text: We just ordered a third shade sail this year after having two up all summer last year (in a contrasting color which is fun). The way the d-rings are sewn directly into the corners makes a nice strong connection. I will say that the two we ordered in the same size are slightly different from each other in dimensions but is probably to be expected when making such large triangles... it doesn't look different once installed. They are really pretty and provide great shade from the hot Georgia sun. We have had many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Lenos Key

customer_reviews.title: Ordered "Sand". Got ???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Sand version, twice. It came with no color identification on the package label, but was very yellow - almost mustard - like the photo of the DESERT Sand version. Don't know what's going on, but if you want a tan hue, then this is not for you. Returned both items.
customer_reviews.author: rafuhrman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These work great. We put up 3. Not as big as you may expect. When in doubt order larger one. Also have to buy the attachment cables. So far they work awesome. Good shade and flowing well on a very windy hill.
customer_reviews.author: tom Mann

customer_reviews.title: I liked that the rain goes through the shade rather than ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job over the pool - my fault I wish I had purchased a larger shade. I liked that the rain goes through the shade rather than puddling in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G

customer_reviews.title: Pimp it up a little
customer_reviews.text: Works best in my opinion in a area with low furniture. Additional solar LED where added for extra bling. I used a misting system behind so the water comes down easy. Shade is stretching nicely and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ZoomTc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my backyard
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and color for my little back yard. It shades my BBQ grill and adds a perfect esthetic to what I was going for. I installed it myself using cable and turnbuckle kit purchases through Amazon for $11. Totally worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A

customer_reviews.title: Shady
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality and was easy to install. Hardware comes separate and I watched the videos. The color was slightly different than what I was expecting as the picture showed, but still nice and worked well in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus & CJ Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great thick shade.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a square shade before. So in comparison, this is definitely much stronger/thicker material with tringle rings instead of D ring which always shifts. Color is dark green.
customer_reviews.author: BigBoy

customer_reviews.title: Some shade provided
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to shade our driveway. The dimensions stated are accurate but the ropes for fastening are only 5 feet long. So if one wants to attach corners farther, more rope needs to be purchased along with fasteners (as a turnbuckle mentioned in the directions and not included). It provides some shade, probably could use two doubled over in really hot areas. Not too easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: carol mcc

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: Expected a 16x16x16 as description shows, it's actually 14.5 x 15.5 x 15.5. Have not tried to install yet to see if it will work where we wanted, may return instead. Disappointed with this from the start.
customer_reviews.author: tiggerfun42

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a giant underwear hanging in my backyard but it does the job. Just a tip, it’s cheaper to use an electrical metal pipe than metal post. You can find both at the big orange store.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina & Jonah

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good shade for the backyard.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised ( exact size, brilliant color and quality materials). This triangle sun shade is a perfect size for my backyard that gives a good spot for my dog to rest while watching us to do gardening under the sun. It captures some falling leaves and flowers from the tree. It's easy to install if you have some post ready and additional hardware like jack chain and turn buckle. Don't over tighten it because it may form crescent shape. I am happy for my purchase and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela Banzon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This shade sail fit perfectly for what I needed it for! Great product, sturdy and attractive. Easy to install. This turned out better than expected. Very good product and I though the price was very reasonable too. If you're thinking about buying these I'd totally suggest you do!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Aselton Benoit

customer_reviews.title: The best !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 and I love them! I out them up by myself but it would go a lot easier if there were 2 of us. They have lasted through 70 plus mph winda.. be sure to concrete or sink your poles 3 or 4 foot down or they can pull up in high winds. One had a defect and once I notified them, they had another on the way before I even sent mine back!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: nice sail but ropes provided for installation are very short
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these as replacements for a pair we had installed for a number of years which had finally wore out. The material is of good quality, but the ropes provided for installation are very short (+/- 4 feet). We ended up using the much longer ropes from our old worn out sails to install the new ones. I don't recall seeing any information on rope length when we purchased our new sails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep cool in the summer sun
customer_reviews.text: Effective and easy to install. Just make sure the attachment points can take the tension required to keep the shade in position. It needs probably 20 or 30 pounds of tension on each attachment point. Keeps the patio much cooler in the summer sun.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement shade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I bought this shade as a replacement for a heavier gage shade where on internal seam proved to be the weak link and break point. Though lighter gage material, this one has no internal seams.
customer_reviews.author: ThoughtFilled

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great sail for shade. Love the color and ease of installation. The only thing I would recomend is getting some good attachment points. The rope sent with the sail is garbage and will slip all of your knots.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shade!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, recommend two person install, or at least for initial measurements. I anchored it in the corner I wanted then I stretched out the sail and marked it where the other two anchors would go. I didn’t use the line that was provided, I bought turnbuckles.
customer_reviews.author: jerry sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this shade over my back patio. Much bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Harris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It’s what my parents want for backyard. There are different sizes and shapes. Hence, it’s important to know what size you want. It’s very easy to install and maintain. The quality is high as well. We have used for almost two weeks. It’s working great so far. It’s sturdy enough as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and very good quality. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift but they went up easy and look great! Held up for the summer and kept the deck nice and cool! Held up perfectly to the summer sun everyday! Make sure you measure twice!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Shade
customer_reviews.text: We bought one just to see how we liked it and sure enough it lasted so we bought two more just this time they came with rope out first one did not have rope
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: We bought the rust color 20x20x20 shade. It was so nice we ordered a sand colored one to layer over it. I highly recommend this seller, as the customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: California Smile

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot Florida summer
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Im already considering ordering a second one. The shade it gives is great its not overly intrusive where itll feel like your indoors. It lets in just the right amount of light. I went fot the 20x20x20 and im sure glad i did.
customer_reviews.author: jeisy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & durable
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, very happy. We ordered one more for the other side of our yard. Provides shade and coverage from hawks & owls for our small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good sail shade, does what you want!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, easy to set up... Does exactly what you expect it to do. I think if stored correctly - taken down during wet season, etc - this sail will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Batsford

customer_reviews.title: Water in pool is so much cooler now
customer_reviews.text: We needed for our pool to have shade to keep the water cooler. The sun shade worked great. My only complaint is it is a triangle so I had to purchase two to shade my pool.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor material
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the material. It is Peru for shade and won’t hold pools of water on top because it is woven. It also doesn’t mildew because it is a plastic type material but from a distance it looks like canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Treyh730

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Will take it down for fall but it serves its purpose. Was hard to install but everyone loves it. Provides shade and is permeable.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Boys

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations ❤️
customer_reviews.text: It’s in my backyard & looks & works great! I live in Phoenix AZ & it actually feels cooler than without it, my plants don’t get scorched like before, especially my Don Juan rose bush. I highly recommend this shade sail.
customer_reviews.author: Marylou B Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: 1 year later and looks just the same as day 1! No rips. Didn’t fade. Blocks the sun great! Just wish I was smart enough when it comes to optimal placement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel MacPherson

customer_reviews.title: With stand the heat and the monsoon
customer_reviews.text: Its for the back yard. Still have to dig holes posts in the ground cement then have to buy the tide ounce and then put it together but the materials well made its gonna be something that's gonna last through the monsoon and monsoons to come
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides good shade
customer_reviews.text: Installed this over my grandkid's sand play area. The sun was very intense there. Even though I like this product, I wish I has bought a square one that would cover more area.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest in the dimensions I could find, holding up well!
customer_reviews.text: Only been used one season so far. Easy to install and looks great. I may update the review at the end of next summer once I’ve stored it and re hung it to see how it does over the year. I renovated our pool deck and added the sail, it’s the first thing people compliment. I’d give it 5 stars, especially for the price point, but a few pencil sized or smaller holes have appeared in it. Not sure what from. Doesn’t affect the performance, just a bit of a bummer. I biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Francis

customer_reviews.title: Read this
customer_reviews.text: It comes with tiny ugly rope ties. The air doesn’t pass through though so there’s a lot of kite kind of pull. It’s not a canvas at all. It’s very plastic like. We will see how long it lasts. I’m not sure. The color is nice, the rings are kind of thin but they seem attached ok.
customer_reviews.author: clara garcia

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: The product itself meets my expectations. The instructions could have been a little more helpful but I was able to figure it out simple enough. Shipping was timely. All in all satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jandblove

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade!
customer_reviews.text: I like the Shade very Much, it is not warmth - I god it for the Shade and Cooler feeling underneath! It is Great! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Kristensen

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, but...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product except for one problem. The first one we bought was perfectly seamless, but the next two had this very obvious large seam running across the end of one of the points of the triangle. It is distracting and mars the beauty of the product. Ive purchased two more and returned them both because of the seam. I will try one more time and hopefully I will get a seamless sail. Note the picture used has no seam.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Very large!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of material looks good and the shade is very large so it'll provide a great amount of shade! Just know that it doesn't come with the fixing accessories/tensioners so you need to buy that separately. And you need to be fairly precise when installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: 3 months and it's already ripping I have other ones I know how to install these Factory defect
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product but make sure you buy the hardware and a length of rope.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and at first I didnt realize you need to purchase the hardware separately. I recommend you get some rope and have a 2nd person help you to install.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Orbeck

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well in Florida Keys
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this shade sail. First one is two years old and shows absolutely no signs of wear. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: drich

customer_reviews.title: Buy the install kit.
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need to buy the installation kit. Otherwise, this has been a welcome addition to our deck. The temperature difference is very noticeable compared to the the unshaded portion of our deck. Easy install with the recommended installation kit.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

product_meta.title: Shade&Beyond Sun Shade Sail Triangle 20'x20'x20' UV Block for Yard Patio Lawn Garden Deck Sand Color
product_meta.description:
Size:20'x20'x20'| Color:Sand
Shade&Beyond shade sail information

Product Name: Shade&Beyond 20' x 20'x 20' Triangle Sand Color Sun Shade Sail Canopy with D Rings 
Material: 185 gsm high-quality HDPE sun shade fabric 
Size: 20ftx20ftx20ft 
Color: Sand/ Yellow/ Tan 
Shape: Triangle 
Net Weight: 2.9kg/ 6.4lb 
With hardware kits or ropes: No 
Waterproof: No 
Service Life: 5-year lifetime against UV degradation is guaranteed

Applications for our sun shade sails

Sun shade sails fit both the domestic and commercial market 
A Shade Covering provides protection from the sun and looks great in your home's outdoor areas 
- covering pools, lawn, barbecues,garden, patio areas and spa's. 
And shade sails are also ideal for using in public outdoor areas 
- shopping centres, car yards, mine sites,community centres, child care centres, 
construction sites, schools, playgrounds, park activity areas and sport venues 
In fact, we can place a covering in any area that shade is required.

Installation suggestions for triangle shade sails 

As shown in the image above, with 2 ends higher than the other, the appearance will be very nice, and water can run off the sail more easily 

Maintenance instructions

Clean with mild detergent or water by a sponge or a very soft brush 
Do not scrub it with a stiff brush, scouring pad, or an abrasive cleaner 
Do not put the sail in your washing machine, clothes drier 
Take down the shade sail when extreme weather is coming
feature_bullets: High Quality Guarantee - Constructed of 185 gsm UV protected high density polyethylene (HDPE) shade fabric with strong stitched seam and durable stainless steel D-rings in each corner( The edge is curved, not straight & Hardware sells separately, recommend 8 inch hardware)

Breathable Material Design - Allows cooling breezes and light to pass through for better airy and comfortable space, allows rains to pass through, so there's no pooling water( So it is not waterproof)

Easy to install and maintain - Installation: Measure and clean the area where the shade sail is to be installed. Leave an allowance of 1.5-2ft between the fixing point and the shade sail to fit hardwares/ hooks or ropes. Maintenance: Clean with mild detergent or water, do not scrub it with a stiff brush, do not put it in your washing machine, clothes drier
Long Use Time - 5 years warranty under normal use and weather. Please note that shade cloth is a material can shrink, usually it need tolerance for +-6 inch for each side, thank you

Ideal Shade Solutions - Widely used over a patio, lawn, garden, pool, pond, deck, kailyard, courtyard, backyard, dooryard, park, carport, pergola, sandbox, driveway or other outdoor area to provide 80%-85% sunshade and protect against 95% up to 98% harmful UV rays, and make your patio privacy safe, cool and fabulous

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,430 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
